name: Idle timer disabled
description: Do not disable idle timer, unless absolutely necessary.

name: Rigid Alarm
description: Setting a tolerance for timers will allow them to fire later than the scheduled fire date.

name: Charge Awareness
description: Monitoring power changes and customizing behavior depending on battery level is a good practice.

name: Save Mode Awareness
description: Taking into account when the device is entering or exiting the power save mode is a good practice.

name: Location updates pause disabled
description: Do not disable location updates pause, unless absolutely necessary.

name: Thrifty Geolocation
description: Adapt location accuracy and type to applications needs.

name: Motion Sensor Update Rate
description: Set appropriate motion sensor update rates for the application's needs

name: Brightness Override disabled
description: Do not force Brightness in your code, unless absolutely necessary.

name: Sobriety: Torch Free
description: Usage of `AVCaptureDevice#torchMode` or `AVCaptureDevice#setTorchModeOn(level:)` must absolutely be avoided. These methods can be used to access the device's flashlight, which can be a potential security risk and should only be used when necessary.
